Articles.Content:
All this time i played ksp i made a lot of useless stuff. I just tried to go on Mun when, i tried to land. The bad thing was the last part:

I crashed into the mun with 25m/s but i just wanted to go with 2.0m/s. Hard, but i get a lot of satelites on the orbit the rocket is strange but is made from basic parts. i will put the link with it (for career mode) and the tutorial made in .txt extension. All learning about the basic rocketry

Excuse me for my bad English.
